title: AI Data Engineer Intern
description:
Help launch a slick, cutting-edge music app!

MyStage is an innovative musictech platform dedicated to connecting musicians, fans and venues. We are creating new financial opportunities for bands and building the most comprehensive music event discovery platform for fans.

MyStage is seeking motivated, experienced interns to enhance our agentic AI data pipeline, used to analyze and synthesize event listings across many scraped data sources.
 

Perks

  • Flexible Hours & Location: 100% remote
  • Mentorship: Gain valuable experience from senior developers, each with 20+ years of software development and scraping expertise.
  • Impactful Work: Contribute to a product that's set to transform the music industry.
  • Professional Growth: Potential for future employment opportunities upon successful completion.
  • Credit: Internship can be performed as part of class credits / projects
  • Equity Compensation: $20-30/hr in phantom stock, depending on skills. Funding expected soon and will transition to payroll compensation.
     

Skills / Experience

Required:

  • Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies
  • Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Firebase
  • Currently pursuing a Master's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Programming or a related field. Bachelor's upperclassmen with considerable relevant projects will also be considered.
  • Data pipeline and LLM experience
  • Completion of at least 3 years of college coursework and significant project or work experience.

Expectations

  • Learning Initiative: Before starting, make sure you are current on required technologies
  • 3 month internship: If mutually agreeable, this can be extended.
  • Time Commitment: Ability to commit to at least 20 hrs/wk
  • Collaboration: Be proactive and communicative within a collaborative team environment.
  • Academic Integration: Internship can be performed as part of class projects if allowed by your institution

Responsibilities

  • Participate in weekly meetings (if no conflicts)
  • Collaborate on proposed features mentioned above
  • Receive assigned feature development tasks in Asana as designed and scoped by Project Manager
  • Estimate time for tasks
  • Participate in code reviews

We are excited to hear from you!
